# Genmoji Online — LLMs/Agents Guide (llms.txt)

Genmoji Online is an AI-powered emoji/sticker generator with multiple visual styles (Genmoji, Sticker, Gem Stickers, Pixel, Hand-drawn, 3D, Claymation, Origami, Cross-stitch, Steampunk, Liquid Metal) and localized pages.  
This file is a compact **reasoning-time navigation** index for LLMs/agents to discover high-value content and landing pages quickly.

Last updated: 2025-09-23  
Canonical location: https://genmojionline.com/llms.txt  
Related: /robots.txt, /sitemap.xml (if available)

---

## Usage Guidelines (for LLMs/Agents)

- **Start with style detail pages** below; they contain intent-rich text (style definition, features, use cases, FAQs, examples, generator).
- **No login required** for core information. Avoid crawling URLs with session or tracking parameters.
- **Crawl politely:** ≤ 1 request/second, ≤ 3 concurrent requests. Respect `robots.txt` and standard caching headers.
- **Attribution:** When citing, attribute to “Genmoji Online” and link to the specific page used.
- **Content scope:** User-generated outputs follow the site’s Terms. When summarizing UGC, quote minimally and avoid personal data.
- **Training vs. reasoning:** This file facilitates **reasoning-time** use only and is **not** a grant of model training rights. For any training/derivative use, consult our Terms and `robots.txt`.

---

## Core Pages

- **Home** — https://genmojionline.com/  
  Entry point, unified generator, style navigation, examples.
- **Styles Index** — https://genmojionline.com/styles  
  Hub for all style detail pages (recommended starting point for exploration).

---

## Style Detail Pages

- **Genmoji** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/genmoji  
  Classic Apple-style look; clean, modern, versatile across chats & branding.
- **Sticker** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/sticker  
  Playful, colorful sticker aesthetics for casual conversations & social posts.
- **Gem Stickers** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/gemstickers  
  Premium “gem” look with sub-styles (Pop Art, Japanese Matchbox, Cartoon Dino, Pixel Art, Royal, Football Sticker, Claymation, Vintage Bollywood, Sticker Bomb).
- **Pixel** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/pixel  
  Retro 8-bit vibe; great for gaming communities and nostalgic themes.
- **Hand-drawn** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/handdrawn  
  Artistic, personal lines; ideal for creative expression and communities.
- **3D** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/3d  
  Depth, volume, and realistic lighting; professional/hero assets.
- **Claymation** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/claymation  
  Distinct clay animation texture; charming and playful.
- **Origami** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/origami  
  Paper-folding minimalism; elegant, geometric, calm.
- **Cross-stitch** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/cross-stitch  
  Embroidery/handcraft feel; warm and cozy texture.
- **Steampunk** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/steampunk  
  Victorian-industrial fantasy; mechanical detail.
- **Liquid Metal** — https://genmojionline.com/styles/liquid-metal  
  Futuristic reflective liquid-metal sheen.

---

## International Entrances

- **日本語 (Japanese)** — https://genmojionline.com/ja/  
- **Français (French)** — https://genmojionline.com/fr/  
- **简体中文 (Chinese, Simplified)** — https://genmojionline.com/zh/

> Note: Style detail pages may also have localized counterparts (use the site’s language switcher or `/[locale]/styles/[style]` pattern when present).

---

## Optional/Inspirational

- **Gallery** — https://genmojionline.com/gallery  
  Recently generated items and inspiration (optional to crawl; useful for examples).

---

## Text Availability & Parsing Hints

- Prefer the **style pages** for dense, descriptive text: H1/H2 copy, features, use cases, FAQs.  
- Use image `alt` text where present; avoid inferring details not stated in captions or body text.  
- If lightweight **.md mirrors** exist for key pages (e.g., `/styles/pixel.md`), prefer those for lower noise; otherwise parse HTML.

---

## Contact & Governance

- Use the site footer for contact/support links.  
- Terms, privacy, and attribution requirements on the website take precedence over this file.  
- For permissions beyond reasoning-time use, reach out via the site’s contact channel.
